last_episode_to_air.name: The Last Temptation of Blank
last_episode_to_air.overview: Winona Ryder stars as Fran, the coolest girl in school, who makes a bet that she can make Jerri so cool that even Brent Brooks (Paul Rudd) will ask her out.

name: Strangers with Candy
overview: Strangers with Candy is a television series produced by Comedy Central. It first aired on April 7, 1999, and concluded its third and final season on October 2, 2000. Its timeslot was Sundays at 10:00 p.m.. In 2007, Strangers with Candy was ranked #30 on TV Guide's Top Cult Shows Ever.

episodes.name: Old Habits/New Beginnings
episodes.overview: Jerri tries to fit in by mixing up a batch of the drug concoction Glint for Poppy, the most popular girl in school... with mixed results.

episodes.name: A Burden's Burden
episodes.overview: In order to teach students the responsibility of taking care of a baby, Coach Wolf gives each student a baby.

episodes.name: Dreams on the Rocks
episodes.overview: Jerri's starring role in the school play stirs up a dangerous cocktail of jealousy and regret in her stepmother, Sara

episodes.name: Who Wants Cake?
episodes.overview: Jerri is told she must help Principal Blackman out by turning snitch and rooting out the school retard if she wants to go on the class trip to Good Time Island.

episodes.name: Bogie Nights
episodes.overview: Jerri falls for a transfer student and later discovers the terrible secret that will keep them apart forever.

episodes.name: Let Freedom Ring
episodes.overview: Flatpoint High is up in arms to find out whodunit after someone scrawls a racial slur on the wall.

episodes.name: Feather in the Storm
episodes.overview: Jerri finds her calling on the debate team, but can she make it through the dangerous physical training for the big competition?

episodes.name: To Be Young, Gifted and Blank
episodes.overview: Noblet discovers that Jerri is a violin prodigy and ruthlessly grooms her to become the star he always wanted to be.

episodes.name: Jerri Is Only Skin Deep
episodes.overview: Desperate to become homecoming queen, Jerri concocts some unique strategies to eliminate the competition.

episodes.name: The Trip Back
episodes.overview: Jerri reverts back to her old ways and succumbs to drugs in an attempt to win the affection of a beautiful female stoner

episodes.name: The Virgin Jerri
episodes.overview: Jerri's back out of prison and back to being a freshman at Flatpoint High. . . again. She's determined to be a proper girl, if only that little devil on her shoulder would stop trying to convince her otherwise. Coach Wolf encourages her female students to remain chaste and convinces Jerri that she can reclaim her virginity. All the girls take to wearing ""Never Been Touched"" ribbons with a cherry dangling from them.

episodes.name: Behind Blank Eyes
episodes.overview: Jerri falls for Alan, a blind boy at her school with football aspirations.  The rest of the team, however, is skeptical about his abilities, but with Jerri's encouragement, Alan rises to the occasion.

episodes.name: Yes You Can't
episodes.overview: Everyone's got careers on the brain during Flatpoint's ""Yes You Can't"" career exploration week -- and not just the students.  Mr. Noblet revisits his dreams of rockstardom, Mr. Jellineck quits teaching to pursue his art, and Jerri tries to decide between a career in the flower factory or as a junkie whore.

episodes.name: The Goodbye Guy
episodes.overview: Jerri suffers a devastating loss and can find no sympathy for her grief, though Mr. Jellineck chips in with his special blend of self-important empathy.  The Father-Daughter Sack Race plays a pivotal role in this Very Special Episode.

episodes.name: The Blank Page
episodes.overview: Jerri has a difficult time in Noblet's class when she's asked to read from Moby Dick.    When she realizes that cheerleaders get all the guys, plus they're treated with kid gloves in class, she decides to try out for the Donkettes squad. She learns right away that cheerleaders need to know how to spell. Her illiteracy is quickly revealed and Jerri is immediately subjected to complete humiliation.

guest_stars.character: Señora Maria de los Angeles Pons Montez Garcia y Perez
guest_stars.name: Rose Abdoo

episodes.name: Hit and Run
episodes.overview: Someone hits Mr. Jellineck with their car, and the whole school is turned upside-down trying to find the culprit.  Meanwhile, Jerri wrestles with her conscience, and Mr. Noblet considers revealing his secret feelings for Geoffrey in an effort to encourage his recovery.

episodes.name: To Love, Honor and Pretend
episodes.overview: Coach Wolf assigns marriages for her students for a class project. Jerri get paired up with Ronnie Leggett. After Jerri finds problems with her new “marriage,” she learns that it is not as easy as she thought it will be. Will Jerri be able to save her “marriage” and her grade?

episodes.name: The Blank Stare (1)
episodes.overview: Feeling rejected by her classmates and abandoned by her family, Jerri is seduced into joining a religious cult.

episodes.name: The Blank Stare (2)
episodes.overview: After first attempting to stop Jerri from escaping, the leader of the cult realizes how annoying she is and tries to get rid of her, while Principle Blackman, Mr. Noblet and Mr. Jellineck try to rescue her.

episodes.name: A Price Too High for Riches
episodes.overview: Jerri struggles with class issues as the new shoe of the moment (""Flairs"") is a wee bit out of her price range.  She snags a job at the local shoe store and schemes to procure a pair of the salacious shoes in time for popular rich girl Melissa's party.  However, Orlando has a party scheduled for that same evening, and Jerri's snobbery regarding his lower-income-bracket party threatens their friendship.

episodes.name: Jerri's Burning Issue
episodes.overview: After deflowering a male classmate, Jerri finds out that she has contracted a series of STDs (syphillis infested with crabs which are carrying gonorrhea) and must inform all her partners of her discovery.  Meanwhile, Mr. Jellineck and Mr. Noblet have problems concealing their own bout with a particularly noticeable STD.

episodes.name: Is Freedom Free?
episodes.overview: Told in her art class to photograph something that represents freedom, Jerri creates a nude self-portrait which is immediately banned by the principal. So Jerri goes on a hunger strike.

episodes.name: Trail of Tears
episodes.overview: When Jerri discovers her American Indian heritage, she attends a camp run by a councilor who teaches adopted Indian children about aspects of their culture, such as alcoholism and gambling.

episodes.name: Invisible Love
episodes.overview: Jerri and class hunk Laird are having a fling, but he is insistent on keeping it a secret.  So Jerri finds herself forced to hide out in odd places like Laird's locker, the trunk of his car, a trash can, etc., so they can continue their secret rendezvous.  Meanwhile, Jerri's stepmother experiences relationship troubles with Stew, prompting an unusual bonding moment between stepmother and stepdaughter.

episodes.name: Is My Daddy Crazy?
episodes.overview: Jerri's new daddy Stew starts to act very strangely, which makes Jerri reluctant to bring him to class for Occupation Week.

episodes.name: Blank Relay
episodes.overview: Jerri joins the track team, but years of hard living have taken their toll on her physique.  She turns to supplements of a most dubious nature to improve her performance, and the results surprise everyone at Flatpoint.

episodes.name: Ask Jerri
episodes.overview: At the bequest of Mr. Noblet, Jerri takes over an advice column formerly penned by Mr. Jellineck, which results in diabolical intentions on Geoffrey's part towards Chuck, and anger from nearly everyone in Flatpoint High towards Jerri.

episodes.name: Sexual Harrasment (aka There Once Was a Blank from Nantucket)
episodes.overview: Jerri is asked out at a school wrestling game, but the boy later takes back his offer because other boys are saying mean sexual things to Jerri and she does nothing about it. So Tamela tells her she was a victim of sexual harassment and she needs to stick up for herself. Jerri later starts liking another guy, but is afraid it will end soon because of the other guys harassing her.

episodes.name: Bully
episodes.overview: A new student comes to Flatpoint High, who turns out to be a bully who everyone is afraid of. When Jerri stops a fight with the bully and her friend Tammy, the bully schedules a fight for after school. Everyone keeps telling Jerri that she shouldn't fight and find peace, but Jerri feels she should live by the street code and fight. Geoffry gets a bully of his own when a homosexual hater substitute confronts him.

episodes.name: The Last Temptation of Blank
episodes.overview: Winona Ryder stars as Fran, the coolest girl in school, who makes a bet that she can make Jerri so cool that even Brent Brooks (Paul Rudd) will ask her out.
